customblocker.name: Entry Staircase
customblocker.description: It's a stairway leading out of the dungeon. Unfortunately, it's blocked.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: They're iron bars and they're not moving for anyone.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in a draft.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in a draft.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in a draft.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in a draft.

customblocker.name: Entry Staircase
customblocker.description: Only good adventurers get to leave the Dungeon. Bad adventurers leave the Dungeon in a body bag.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: They're iron bars and they're not moving for anyone.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: The Dwarven Educational System is well-known for two things: its efficiency, and having more teaching equipment made out of ferrous metal than any other civilization.

customblocker.name: Diggle Pen Bars
customblocker.description: This is a low grade set of Diggle Pen Bars. It is decorated with Diggle Excreta.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: This is a Dwarven Educational Grate. All craftsdwarfship is typical of the underfunding of the Dwarven Educational System.

customblocker.name: Wooden Gate
customblocker.description: A gate, constructed of the Stoutest of Timbers.

customblocker.name: Wooden Gate
customblocker.description: A gate, constructed of slightly less stout timbers than the other gate.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: This is a Dwarven Educational Grate. It is all that stands between you and your death.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: This is a Dwarven Educational Grate. A Dwarf named Pozzo threw up here in the year 270 after consuming forty-three liters of Sewer Brew.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: The Dwarven Educational System is well-known for two things: its efficiency, and having more teaching equipment made out of ferrous metal than any other civilization.

customblocker.name: Dungeon Rubble
customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way, and conceals the fact that we could only afford one Dwarven Educational Grate.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Every time you see a Dwarven Educational Grate, you feel just a little more educated. At this rate, you will be the most educated Dwarf in the world. Also, the tallest.

customblocker.name: Dungeon Rubble
customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way, and conceals the fact that we could only afford one Dwarven Educational Grate.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Yet again, more useful items are stored behind the Dwarven Educational Grate.

customblocker.name: Dungeon Rubble
customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Yet again, more useful items are stored behind the Dwarven Educational Grate.

customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Yet again, more useful items are stored behind the Dwarven Educational Grate.

customblocker.name: Dungeon Rubble
customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way.

customblocker.name: Dungeon Rubble
customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way.

customblocker.name: Dungeon Rubble
customblocker.description: A large pile of rubble blocks your way, and conceals the fact that we could only afford one Dwarven Educational Grate.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Educational Grate
customblocker.description: Haven't you suffered enough at the hands of the Dwarven Educational System? Evidently not.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker welcomingly at you. Is that incense?

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker welcomingly at you. Is that incense?

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker welcomingly at you. Is that incense?

customblocker.name: Rusty Anvil
customblocker.description: This anvil is covered in rust and has a huge crack right through the middle.

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of rust.

customblocker.name: Furnace
customblocker.description: The furnace is empty and cold.

loot.subtype: My Little Anvil Junior Smithing Kit

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of rust and muck.

customblocker.name: Rusty Anvil
customblocker.description: This anvil is covered in rust and has a huge crack right through the middle.

customblocker.name: Furnace
customblocker.description: The furnace is empty and cold.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Mold-form
customblocker.description: A dusty smelter mold.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Furnace
customblocker.description: A dusty smelter furnace.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: It's mostly a table. What did you expect?

customblocker.name: Smelter, Mold-form
customblocker.description: A dusty smelter mold.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Furnace
customblocker.description: A dusty smelter furnace.

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of dross.

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of dross.

customblocker.name: Short Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: A short alchemy workbench. There are only a few dubious-looking oils remaining.

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of pungent sludge.

customblocker.name: Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: An alchemy workbench. The bottles are chipped and cracked. All the good stuff has looted.

customblocker.name: Alchemist's Still
customblocker.description: This still-slash-alembic is cold and still. Who knows what potent potables once flowed through these pipes?

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: It's mostly a table. What did you expect?

customblocker.name: Short Tinkerer's Workbench
customblocker.description: A short tinkerer's workbench. There are only a few suspicious-looking gears lying around.

customblocker.name: Rusty Bin
customblocker.description: It's a gross old bin full of stripped bolts, square wheels, and toothless cogs.

customblocker.name: Tinkerer's Workbench
customblocker.description: A tinkerer's workbench. A number of bent rods and failed widgets are strewn about; nothing useful.

customblocker.name: Tinkerer's Furnace
customblocker.description: You could see yourself heating up a nice can of beans on this stove.

customblocker.name: Table
customblocker.description: It's mostly a table. What did you expect?

customblocker.name: Practice Target
customblocker.description: Whoever used this last wasn't a very good shot.

customblocker.name: Practice Target
customblocker.description: Looks familiar somehow.

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: The shelves are covered with trash and dubious-looking stains.

customblocker.name: Old Shelves
customblocker.description: On these shelves there's an old shopping list and a glass of milk someone left out for a couple decades.

customblocker.name: Dirty Bookshelf
customblocker.description: Nothing of value remains, it's mostly just ticket stubs, trashy fanfic, and pull-tabs.

customblocker.name: Ancient-looking Shelving Unit
customblocker.description: There are strange outlines in the dust covering this shelf. Something was recently moved but you have no idea what it could have been.

customengraving.name: Burnt Out Magic Spot
customengraving.description: It smells a bit like burnt hair and aqua vitae.

customengraving.name: Burnt Out Magic Spot
customengraving.description: It smells a bit like burnt hair and aqua vitae.

custombreakable.name: Dusty Bookcase
custombreakable.description: The shelves are covered with trashy romance novels and empty jars.

custombreakable.name: Messy Magician's Desk
custombreakable.description: If it ever held magic, there's none left.

customengraving.name: Burnt Out Thaumaturgic Receptacle
customengraving.description: It smells a bit like burnt hair and brimstone.

customengraving.name: Burnt Out Thaumaturgic Receptacle
customengraving.description: It smells a bit like burnt hair and aqua vitae.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The blue flames billow and roll in their chilly little nook.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their hot little cranny.

pedestal.name: A Tome of Fire Or Ice
pedestal.text: [The text contains especially lengthy tangential descriptions of the dishes which appear at the feasts of nobility. You are unable to extract any useful information.]

customblocker.name: Unlucky Formerly-living Adventurer
customblocker.description: A sad sight. Suggestive, perhaps, of your own mortality. Quick, grab the loot!

customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: It says 'Beware the diggles. They're not your friend in nature.'

customblocker.name: Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames burn with hatred for all life.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the dank dungeon breeze.

customblocker.name: Weird Wall-fungus
customblocker.description: The pungent stench of mildew emanates from the wet dungeon wall.

customblocker.name: Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames seem to enjoy their cosy little nook.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the dank dungeon breeze.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The fire burns gloomily.

customengraving.name: Burnt Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are cold and dead.

customblocker.description: The flames seem to ponder upon their burning.

customblocker.name: Propaganda Poster
customblocker.description: 'Join Lord Dredmor: his dark-yet-efficacious magicks shall unite all the under-dwellers in Victory over the sunny surface world! This message approved by Lord Dredmor.'

customblocker.name: Propaganda Poster
customblocker.description: 'Fear the large eyebrowed one; it brings strange diseases. Fight to the last!'

customblocker.name: Propaganda Poster
customblocker.description: 'When you walk with Dredmor, you walk with Victory. May his black geometry guide us! This message approved by Lord Dredmor.'

customblocker.name: Propaganda Poster
customblocker.description: 'Have you seen this large-eyebrowed person? They are wanted on charges of vandalism, looting, and mass slaughter. Report sightings to Lord Dredmor for rich rewards.'

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles have been burnt out for a long time.

customblocker.name: Grave of Akumos
customblocker.description: Here lies Akumos, sworn enemy of the pumpkinn, who died just as he lived: quickly.

customblocker.name: G__ve of __sic_
customblocker.description: The grave's inscription is damaged. It looks suspiciously like the work of diggles.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker grimly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customblocker.name: Grave of Stark
customblocker.description: Here lies Stark the Mycologist. It is said that he was driven raving mad by the effects of his crop.

customblocker.name: Grave of Daynab
customblocker.description: Here lies Daynab who had more swords than sense.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customblocker.name: Grave of Flex
customblocker.description: Here lies the meatcrafter named Flex. His work, too radical to be appreciated in its time, earned him the moniker 'Gagflex'.

customblocker.name: Grave of Everdraed
customblocker.description: Here lies the foul pirate Everdraed who gave up the family occupation for the calling of his dreams: rogue archaeology. He was beheaded by a giant spinning blade.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customengraving.description: The candles flicker grotesquely.

customblocker.description: The name is unreadable and stone cold.

customblocker.name: Stone Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: The sarcophagus holds its dead and its secrets forever.

customblocker.name: Stone Sarcophagus
customblocker.description: There is no name on this stone sarcophagus.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the cool crypt's draft.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: Here lies York son of Blork son of Lekon.

customblocker.description: The flames wave despondently at nothing.

customblocker.name: Busted Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Staring at this lamp makes your eyes hurt.

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: The random patterns are strangely mesmerizing.

customblocker.name: Busted Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Staring at this lamp makes your eyes hurt.

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: The random patterns are strangely mesmerizing.

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: Staring at this thing makes your head hurt.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Busted Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Staring at this lamp makes your eyes hurt.

customblocker.name: Dirty Bookshelf
customblocker.description: It's a nasty old bookshelf, who'd want it?

customblocker.name: Alchemy Workbench
customblocker.description: An alchemical workbench. Looks like slim pickings.

customblocker.name: Alchemist's Still
customblocker.description: This still-slash-alembic is cold and also still. It reeks of portentious potables.

customblocker.name: Kaput Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Staring at this lamp makes your eyes hurt.

pedestal.name: The Relics
pedestal.text: Here lies the tomb of the unknown hero. He came from another world and departed ours too soon. His deeds are many and legendary. We put his rocket launcher somewhere safe.

customblocker.name: Harmless Red Cube
customblocker.description: The cube appears to be docile.

room.name: John Romero's Head Is Hidden Here Somewhere

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: These are reference manuals for extra-planar anatomy.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: It's mostly Thrusty adventure novels in this shelf.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the draft.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: You've found some of the dungeon employment records.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: Oh, indecipherable texts with saucy illustrations! It's not clear at all what is going on.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the draft.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the draft.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: A book called 'Kruach Aum' is featured prominantly, whatever that means.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: These are a series of political treatises, 'On the Rule and Rights of Dominion Concerning Those That Be Undead Beings By Means of Magicks Most Unholy', volumes IV through XXI, though it is missing VII, XIV, and IXX.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: Tax records. It looks like *someone* hasn't been reporting their full quarterly earnings.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: A series of moralistic tracts 'revealing the scourge of health potion addiction which afflicts our veterns'.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the draft.

customengraving.name: Bone Pile
customengraving.description: The bones are covered with cute little bite marks.

customengraving.name: Bone Pile
customengraving.description: The bones are covered with cute little bite marks.

room.name: The Incredibly Screwed Up Room of Meat

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: One of your predecessors.

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: You really, really, don't want to know where all this meat came from.

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: Another unhappy skeleton.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the draft.

customengraving.name: Candles
customengraving.description: The candles sputter in the damp air.

customblocker.name: Rusty Ol' Bin
customblocker.description: You pretend you didn't look at what was inside this gross old bin.

customblocker.name: Rusty Ol' Bin
customblocker.description: It holds only emptiness.

customblocker.name: Rusty Ol' Bin
customblocker.description: Just dross.

room.name: Another Day in the Lump Factory

customblocker.description: Through the slipgate you glimpse visions of elder worlds that contain fear beyond imagination.

customblocker.name: Grave of Gretchen
customblocker.description: A member of The Heroic Friends, in the end the one situation Gretchen could not charm her way out of was the deadly embrace of the Dwarven Riddle-trap. The Dwarves don't really understand how riddles are supposed to work so they invariably end in crushing and spikes.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles are burned out.

customblocker.name: Grave of Gunther
customblocker.description: A member of The Heroic Friends, Gunther was cut down by a despicable robber-knight. Well. Actually more like several dozen of the robber-knight's men. They threw him off a bridge because they couldn't cut through Gunther's plate armour. Fortunately, it was the dead of winter and the river was frozen solid. Unfortunately, the river was frozen solid. Suddenly a pack of hungry wolves appeared and [the story goes on for some tiresome length before Gunther finally gets it].

customblocker.name: Grave of Ebhard
customblocker.description: A member of The Heroic Friends and devout monk, Ebhard's prayers of cleansing and healing offended a crowd of loathesome peasants, several gargoyles, and especially the demon who had enthralled the whole lot. Thus ended Ebhard.

customblocker.name: Grave of Hans
customblocker.description: A brief member of The Heroic Friends, Hans did not manage to even start his greatest adventure: While mixing up a batch of his special 'Thunder Bomb' potions, the inn and several surrounding structures collapses in a burst of flames. Then the rubble exploded. Hans' adventuring companions swore to official investigators that the whole thing was some kind of coincidence, swamp gas maybe, and they didn't even know that guy very well besides who knows where he got off to.

customblocker.description: It reads 'What does being fair have to do with anything?'

customblocker.name: Tomb of Lekon
customblocker.description: Here lies Lekon The Seer. With his dying breath he spoke: 'It wasn't worth the wait.'
